Immune System Diseases/Hypersensitivity/Hypersensitivity, Immediate/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Rhinitis, Allergic, Seasonal
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Rhinitis, Allergic, Seasonal
Record.Description: Allergic rhinitis that occurs at the same time every year. It is characterized by acute CONJUNCTIVITIS with lacrimation and ITCHING, and regarded as an allergic condition triggered by specific ALLERGENS.
